clauses.title: This service does not track you
clauses.description: The document excerpt needs to include the words "[the service] does not track [users]" or "[the service] does not use any tracking technology".
clauses.clause_text: No tracking or intrusive advertising. We are heavily opposed to industry standard tracking tools like Google Analytics, which gathers and analyzes your browsing history to sell you better advertisements. Instead, we use an open-source, privacy-focused, and self-hosted Matomo analytics installation.

clauses.title: Features of the website are made available under a free software license
clauses.description: This case applies to services under licenses that are free as in "freedom". According to the Free Software Foundation, "free software is the software that grants the user the freedom to share, study, and modify it". Furthermore, the code is entirely open source and may be used without any restriction, including for commercial purposes.
clauses.clause_text:
For our open-source repositories, we use GitHub. We also use GitHub as our CDN for desktop application downloads.

For Windows application code signing, we use a Digicert Extended Validation Certificate. For macOS code signing, we use a verified Apple Developer account.

case.text: Features of the website are made available under a free software license

clauses.title: User-generated content is encrypted, and this service cannot decrypt it
clauses.description: Content generated by the users is end-to-end encrypted, in a way that it can't be accessed by anyone unauthorised, and even the service has no technical means to decrypt it.
clauses.clause_text: Your notes are always encrypted with a secure key that no one has besides you, and this key never leaves your computer or touches a cloud. Simply put: you are the only person that can read your private notes.

case.text: User-generated content is encrypted, and this service cannot decrypt it

clauses.title: User feedback is invited regarding changes to the terms.
clauses.description: The Service takes user suggestions into account to update its Terms.
clauses.clause_text: And we confirm with you that you are comfortable with those changes.

case.text: Your feedback is invited regarding changes to the terms.

clauses.title: The service allows you to use pseudonyms
clauses.description: You don't need to provide your full name to use the Service and you are allowed to use a pseudonym instead.
clauses.clause_text: You may choose to anonymize your email during registration, however, this is not recommended, as we will not be able to provide you with support on this account.

clauses.title: The terms for this service are easy to read
clauses.description: The Agreements are well-organised, define legal terms (where applicable), aren't needlessly long and may be pleasant to read.

case.text: The terms for this service are easy to read

clauses.title: You have the right to leave this service at any time
clauses.description: You can stop using the service and/or cancel or delete your account at any time for any reason. Moreover, the termination is reasonably fast and simple.
clauses.clause_text: You may choose to have your account deleted.

case.text: You have the right to leave this service at any time

clauses.title: The service provides a free help desk
clauses.description: The service can be easily contacted for questions or provides a support center at no extra cost.
clauses.clause_text:
If you have any questions or concerns whatsoever, please don't hesitate to get in touch:
help@standardnotes.org.

case.text: A free help desk is provided

clauses.title: You can opt out of promotional communications
clauses.description: You can update your account preferences and/or easily unsubscribe of email/sms lists to stop receiving promotional communications.
clauses.clause_text:
Upon registration, you will receive 1 welcome email from us.
At the bottom of that email, you will have the option to permanently unsubscribe from future emails, or decrease your email level.

case.text: You can opt out of promotional communications

clauses.title: Third parties may be involved in operating the service
clauses.clause_text: For our cloud servers and databases, we use Amazon Web Services.

case.text: Third parties are involved in operating the service

clauses.title: The service may change its terms at any time, but the user will receive notification of the changes.
clauses.description: The Terms may be updated without prior notice, but users will be notified of the changes at the moment they will start applying.
clauses.clause_text: We announce when we update those policies.

case.text: The terms may be changed at any time, but you will receive notification of the changes
